channel.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-ACATBA
channel.description:
**Code:** XI-IATI-ACATBA **Name:** Association Centrafricaine de Traduction de la Bible et Alphabetisation **Description:** ACATBA is a charity that exists to promote local language development, Bible translation, literacy and community development in the Central African Republic. They also provide training in basic business skills; this allows beneficiaries to begin income-generating activities and small businesses. **URL:** http://www.wycliffe.net/organizations?entity=CXN&continent=AFR&country=CT
If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
